main event: Witnesses observed a bright object in the sky that changed color from blue to orange, and there were two additional objects nearby.
interesting points: The object was reported to be as bright as a bright light with no sound heard,The object changed color from blue to orange according to the observer,Several witnesses confirmed seeing close objects alongside,The sighting reportedly lasted for several hours,This sighting falls under the documentation of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright light that changed colors, possibly with two additional objects
witness description: Individuals residing in the area with an interest in astronomy
